arStrings.szText:
While channeling {c_important}Incinerate{/c}, your Burning damage is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c}. 

Enemies damaged by {c_important}Incinerate{/c} explode, Burning all surrounding enemies for {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_2]{/c} over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. This effect occurs once per {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.

{c_important}Incinerate{/c} increases Burning damage by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} and enemies hurt by it explode for {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_2]{/c} Burning damage to surrounding enemies.
